Welcome to our Augmented Reality Experience! To view, please allow ONE TIME access to your camera. Nothing fishy this is just how AR works :P ...If you instinctively denied that prompt then you simply have to go into your browser settings and unblock camera access for this validide.io

Hold the coaster at arms length to enjoy the full experience.
To select any of the menu options, just aim the crosshairs on them and wait for a few seconds.

Let's do it


* In case of any problem on iOS, try on Android
